title: Phone muzzle to protect privacy by muffling voice
text:
Phone muzzle to protect privacy by muffling voice 12:31pm GMT - 01:47 
Ukrainian developers say they have found a way to keep important calls private while on the move, at the same time minimising irritating sounds reaching people within earshot. Matthew Bell reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Ukrainian developers say they have found a way to keep important calls private while on the move, at the same time minimising irritating sounds reaching people within earshot. Matthew Bell reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2swv5D8
